articles.title: Leaks Predict $5000 RTX 5090 GPUs in 2026 Thanks to AI Industry Demand - TechPowerUp
articles.description: It's no secret that gaming is suffering under something of an affordability crisis, with increased demand for AI-capable GPUs and DDR5 memory resulting in rising prices for gamers and other far-reaching side effects on the gaming hardware market. Now, though,…
articles.content: Phew... glad mine (MSI RTX Suprim X Liquid SOC... awesome card btw) was "only" 2800 then :D .P.S.: Sold my RTX 4090 for 1915 so before anyone calls me nuts for spending that much moolah on a graphics… [+1270 chars]
